en.welcome_message: Welcome to the eosDAC snapshot and airdrop tool!
en.tool_explanation: Use this form to check if your Ethereum address contained EOS at the snapshot time of April 15th at 1AM UTC. You can also use it to request your airdrop if you had less than 100 EOS during the snapshot. Please be patient as the airdrop will continue until mid May.
en.eth_address_placeholder: 0x... (this should be your public ETH address)
en.no_private_key: Warning: please do not enter your private key!
en.missing_eth_address: Please enter your Ethereum address which held EOS on April 15th at 01:00 UTC.
en.eth_address_not_found: We were unable to find the Ethereum address you supplied in the snapshot data. Please verify you had EOS on April 15th at 01:00 UTC:
en.airdrop_request_success: Thank you! Your airdrop request has been successfully recorded. Please note it may take several days before your tokens are batched and sent to you.
en.requested_explanation: Your airdrop tokens are in the queue to be delivered to you by May 15th. Please be patient for delivery.
en.collected_explanation: Your wallet should already contain your eosDAC tokens.
en.unclaimed_explanation: This address has less than 100 EOS or is an unclaimed exchange address.
